title: IBM to buy HashiCorp in $6.4 billion deal to expand in cloud
description: IBM's $6.4B acquisition of HashiCorp bolsters its AI presence through cloud expansion, despite Q1 revenue missing estimates. The deal, funded by cash, aligns with IBM's strategic focus on AI and cloud technologies.
content: International Business Machines will buy HashiCorp in a deal valued at $6.4 billion, the company said on Wednesday, expanding its cloud-based software products to tap into an AI-powered boom in demand.
